TriggerOraclev10g.name: NOTIFY_MASTER_DETAIL
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
declare
count1 number;
v_count2 number;
v_mobile varchar2(15);
v_email varchar2(100);
begin
IF DBMS_REPUTIL.FROM_REMOTE = FALSE THEN
IF INSERTING then
if :new.action_code in ( 6,64,67,68,69,72,73) then
select count(*) into count1
from osd.comm_master
where process_no = :new.process_no
and year = :new.year
and (mobile_no is not null or e_mail is not null);
if count1 =1 then
select mobile_no ,e_mail
into v_mobile,v_email
from osd.comm_master
where process_no = :new.process_no
and year = :new.year ;

insert into notify(PROCESS_NO,year,SADER_NO,MOBILE_NO,E_MAIL,FINISHED,NOTIFIED)
values (:new.process_no,:new.year,0,to_number(v_mobile),v_email,1,0);

end if;
select count(*) into v_count2
from osd.notify
where process_no = :new.process_no
and year = :new.year ;
if v_count2 > 0 then
update osd.notify
set sader_no = 0 , FINISHED =1
where process_no = :new.process_no
and year = :new.year ;
end if;
end if;
end if;
END IF;
end;
